title: Jef Fisk - 2009 - It's All Rootbeer! (1974) & For Sam (1977)
description:
eac secure cue log scans	

JEF FISK: IT'S ALL ROOTBEER + FOR SAM (With Tom Shader) +4 MINI LP CD NEW  

Korean Exlcusive CD Release Housed in Mini LP Sleeve
LIMITED EDITION

Officially Released by Big Pink 2009(World First Release)

200 COPY LIMITED EDITION

catalogue number ;Big Pink 29

Hailed from Michigan, Jef Fisk is a superb folk singer released two albums privately in the mid 70's. These are eccentric acid folk albums mixed with some country nuance remind of Grateful Dead, Michael Hurley and John Hartford. First time on CD along with 4 bonus tracks.

First Time on CD
LP Miniature with OBI (Promo Strip)
Lyrics & Liner Notes Included 
24 Bit Digital Remaster (For Sam)
4 Bonus Tracks
***"It's All Rootbeer" the absence of the master tapes, original LP recording of the noise state is  poorly, so please understand ***
